arabic.title: (Dawar 3lanas) دور على الناس
text: قلبى يا طير مروح يا مروح فى الغروب
ياغريب عن الصحاب وغريب عن الدروب
عطشان والمية فى اديا حيران مش لاقى مرسيا
دور ع الناس فى قلوب الناس
هتلاقى الخير والخير فى الناس دور ع الناس
بتضحك سكة ليا وبترجع تانى بيا
اتارى الغربة صعبة والخطوة هية هية
وخدنى لية بعيد يا حلم يا عنيد
على شواطى الغربة على شواطى الغربة

english.title: Look for people
text: Oh my heart, like a bird returning home at sunset
Strange to the friends, to the roads
Water in my hands yet thirsty and adrift
Look for people in people's hearts
You shall find the good, search for people
A new road appears, but takes me back to where i started
Homesick is harsh and the steps are the same
Oh my stubborn dream, why taking me so far from home
To the shores of the foreign lands (x2)

english.title: Search for The People
text: Oh my heart, a bird going home under the sunrise
No friends and no roads
Thirsty but can't see the water, totally lost
Search for the people in their heart
You will find the good in them, search for the people
The roads are opining and closing
Being away from home is difficult and you walk the same road
Take me there my strange dream, far away
On strange shores, on strange shores

arabic.title: (شئ من بعيد) shee2 mn be3ed
text: شيء من بعيد ناداني
و أول ما ناداني
جرالي ما جرالي
مش بأيدى يا ابا
ده مش بأيدى يا ابا
ناداني من يميني
ولسة بيناديني
بيقولي حصليني على بلد العجايب
ناداني من شمالي
قال يا ام المهر غالي
تعالي قوام تعالي
خدي من الحب نايب
شيء من بعيد ناداني
و أول ما ناداني
جرالي ما جرالي
ناداني من يميني
ولسة بيناديني
بيقولي حصليني على بلد العجايب
ناداني من شمالي
قال يا ام المهر غالي
تعالي قوام تعالي
خدي من الحب نايب
مش بأيدى يا ابا
ده مش بأيدى يا ابا

english.title: Something far away
text: There is something calling from far away
Once I heard it
Something changed in me
I can't help it
I can't help it
Called is coming from this way
Still calling
Telling me to flow him to wonder land
Called me from the other way
Telling me: my precious
Hurry
Come for your love
There is something calling from far away
Once I heard it
Something changed in me
Called me from this way
Still calling
Telling me to flow him to wonder land
Called me from the other way
Telling me: my precious
Hurry
Come for your love
I can't help it
I can't help it

arabic.title: 3alashan Yeshbehlk | علشان يشبهلك
text: علشان يشبهلك يا حبيبتي
علشان يشبهلك حبيته
كان نفسي أناديلك يا حبيبتي
كان نفسي أناديلك وناديته
كان نفسي أناديلك، أشكيلك
أسمع منك، أبكيلك
كان نفسي أنورلك قمري
وأعملك بإيديا الشاي
أحكيلك في الليل حكاياتي
و أغني لعنيكي بناي
كان نفسي أضمك و بقوة
أضمك إنتي مش هو
كان نفسي أناديلك، أحكيلك
أسمع منك، أبكيلك
كان نفسي وجريت أيامي
خدني البحر و وداني
كان نفسي أناديلك يا حبيبتي

english.title: Because He Looks Like You
text: Because he looks like you, my darling,
Because he looks like you, I loved him
I wanted to call you, my darling
I wanted to call you and I called him
I wanted to call you and complain to you
To hear from you and cry to you
I wanted to light up the moon for you
And make tea for you with my hands
And tell you my stories in the night
And make music to your eyes with a flute
I wanted to hold you tight,
Hold you tight, not him
I wanted to call you and talk to you
Hear from you, cry to you
I wanted these things and the days passed by
The sea took me away
I wanted to call you, my darling

arabic.title: Leh Ya Donia (ليه يا دنيا الواحد)
text: ليه يا دنيا الواحد؟
بيقرب من ناس بيعاه؟
ليه يا دنيا الواحد
يتغرب عن ناس شرياه؟
ليه ديما نظلم؟
ليه ديما نئلم؟
لية نقسى ونجرح ونعذب
كل اللى ادالنا هواه؟
ليه اللي بايعنا
واللي يضيعنا
واللي بيخدعنا وبيخوننا
بنضحي بروحنا فداه؟
أول ما بنكبر
بنهرب من ماضينا
أول ما بنقدر
بندوس أقرب ما لينا
بعد ده كله نعيب ع الدنيا
واحنا العيب مالينا
ولا حب هاممنا
ولا فرح لاممنا
بندور ع الى بيتعبنا ويئلمنا
ونجرى وراه
مشاعرنا قوية
مليانة قسية
دور على واحد فى المية
يوفيلك من جواه
أول ما بتعلا
كتير بيكون حبيبك
أول ما بتحلى
كتير بيداروا عيبك
و أول ما الايام تغدربك
كل الناس تسيبك
الاسم حبايب
أصحاب وقرايب
لكن الاحساس دايما غايب
والحب خلاص بعناه
ولا حضن قريب
ولا قلب يطيب
الظالم تايه فى الطيب
واهو مولد خلق اللة

english.title: why, world
text: Why, world, does the human get close to the people who don't want him?
Why, world, is the human away from the people who want him?
Why do we always wrong? Why do we always cause pain?
Why do we treat cruelly, hurt and torture everyone gives us his love
Why do we sacrifice our souls for the one who doesn't want us, who mislead us
أول ما بنكبر بنهرب من ماضينا
أول ما بنقدر بندوس أقرب مالينا
بعد دا كله نعيب ع الدنيا واحنا العيب مالينا
We don't care about love, we don't get together in happiness
We search for what tires us out and what hurts us, and go for it
Our feelings r strong full of cruelty
Search for 1 in the 100 who is really loyal for u
Once u become great, many will love u
Once u become beautiful, many will hide ur defects
And once the time turns his back to u, all the people will leave u
We so called lovers, friends and relatives
,but the true feeling is always missed, and we've lost the love
There is no close hug, and there's no kind heart
The unjust is mixed with the kind, and it's the festival of god's creatures

english.title: why world? (world = destiny)
text: world ..why do we come closer to people who sold us?
world ..why do we go far from people who bought us?
why do we always injure ? why do we always pain?
why do we indurate , hurt torment who love us ?
why for who sold us , lost us , deceive & double-cross us ....we sacrifice ?
as far as we grow up..we run away from our past
as soon as we can ..we quash the closest to us
after all of that we blame the world ..& we are filled weth defects!
we do not care for love ..for happiness ..we are just looking for what is tire us & bain us !
our feelings are storng & filled with cruelty! ..just search for 1% that can be realyfaithful for you !
as we go higher..we have alot of admires..one we are beatiful ..alot hide our defects !
once the days sells us out..all people leave us
we call us friends & relatives..but feeling are lost ..we sold love
no one is close..no good hearts..the despotic is mixed with the honest
this is how humans are !!!

arabic.title: آه يالالي
text: اه يا لالي يا لالي يا لالي يا ابو العيون السود يا خلي
اه يا لالي يا لالي يا لالي خليك على كيفك تملي
يا عينى يا لالالالي ياروحي يا لالالالي يا سيدى يا لالالالي
آه آه آه آه آه آه آه آه
أول دخولنا الجنينة عيط الياسمين يا لالالالي
والسيسبان اشتكى الورد قال ده مين يا لالالالي
قال العنب افتحوا دا العاشق المسكين يا لالالي
يا عينى يا لالالالي ياروحي يا لالالالي يا سيدي يا لالالالي
آه آه آه آه آه آه آه آه
دول عايروني وقالولي يا اسمر اللون يا لالالالي
صحيح انا اسمر وكل البيض يحبوني يا لالالالي
يا عود قرنفل ما بين الفل حطوني يا لالالالي
يا عينى يا لالالالي ياروحي يا لالالالي يا سيدى يا لالالالي
آه آه آه آه آه آه آه آه
يا رايحين لحلب حبي معاكم راح يا لالالالي
يا مدوقينا لعنبكم، العنب تفاح يا لالالالي
يا مين يجيبلي حبيبي والفؤاد يرتاح يا لالالالي
يا عينى يا لالالالي ياروحي يا لالالالي يا سيدى يا لالالالي
آه آه آه آه آه آه آه آه

english.title: Oh My
text: oh my oh my oh my
oh you with the black eyes my friend
oh my oh my oh my
stay as you please always
oh my eyes, oh my night
oh my soul, oh my night
oh my lord, oh my night
once we entered the garden
the jasmines cried
and the saysaban (a kind of flowers) complained
and the roses asked who's that
here's the hug, open it
it's the poor lover
oh my eyes, oh my night
oh my soul, oh my night
oh my lord, oh my night
they teased me and told me
you dark skinned
yes I am dark skinned but all
the whities love me
oh you stick of cinanmon between
the jasmines and they loved me
oh my eyes, oh my night
oh my soul, oh my night
oh my lord, oh my night
o you who are going to Halipo (a city in Syria)
my love went with you
you who give us the taste of grapes
the grapes are as sweet as apples
o who can bring me my love
and then the heart would rest
oh my eyes, oh my night
oh my soul, oh my night
oh my lord, oh my night

arabic.title: أحمر شفايف
text: أنا باحسد الكحل اللى كحل رموشك
وأحمر شفايف اللى زين شفايف
أنا باحسد الليل اللى سهر عيونك
واحسد عيونى لما اكون ياحبيبتى شايف
أنا باحسد كل كلمة بتسمعيها
كل كلمة بتقوليها
كل حاجة تحسى بيها
عارفة ليه
بحبك بحبك مش عارف قد أيه
فى عيونك السمر بالقى روحى وكيانى
ياللى الحنان سره هو حنانك
دا الحب دا أكيد حب مخلوق عشانى
وانا بردة قلبى يا ملاك مخلوق عشانك

english.title: Red Lips
text: I envy the eyeliner that has lined your eyes
And the red on your mouth that decorates your lips
I envy the night that you stay up to
And I envy my eyes when I look at you
I envy every word you hear
Every word you say
Everything you feel
Do you know why?
I love you, I love you, I don't know how much I do
In your eyes are hills I find my soul roaming
Your tenderness is your secret
That's love, of course it's love, that was made for me
And I am ok, sweet angel, with my heart being made especially for you

arabic.title: أنا بعشق البحر
text: انا بعشق البحر
زيك يا حبيبتي حنون
وساعات زيك مجنون
ومهاجر ومسافر
وساعات زيك حيران
وسعات زيك زعلان
وساعات مليان بالصبر
دانا بعشق البحر
انا بعشق السما
علشان زيك مسامحة
مزروعة نجوم وفرحة
حبيبة وغريبة
عشان زيك بعيدة
وساعات زيك قريبة
بعيون متنغمة
دانا بعشق السما
انا بعشق الطريق
انه فيه لقانا
وفرحنا وشقانا
اصحابنا شبابنا
وفيه ضحكت دموعنا
وفية بكيت شموعنا
وضاع فيه الصديق
دانا بعشق الطريق
انا بعشق البحر
وبعشق السما
وبعشق الطريق
لانهم حياة
وانتي يا حبيبتي
انتي كل الحياة

english.title: I Am in Love With The Sea
text: I am in love with the sea
It's tender just like you
Sometimes crazy
Traveling and wondering
Sometimes confused
Sometimes sad
Sometimes patient
I am in love with the sea
I am in love with the sky
Because it's tolerant just like you
Full of stars and joyfulness
A lover and a stranger
Far away just like you
Sometimes close
Music in your eyes
I am in love with the sky
I am in love with the road
Because it's where we meet
Where our happiness and struggle are
Our friends and our youth
Where our tears turned into laughs
Where our candles is burning
Where we lost our friends
I am in love with the road
I am in love with the sea
In love with the sky
In love with the road
Because they are life
And you my love
Is my life

english.title: I love the sea
text: I love the sea
its affectionate, my love as you
and some times crazy as you
and it migrates and travels
and some times confused as you
and some times upset as you
and some times filled with patience
I love the sea
I love the sky
because its as you forgiving
implanted with stars and joy
and lovely and weird
because like you its far
and sometimes like you its near
with eyes full with melodies
I love the sky
I love the road
because in it the place we meet
and in it our happiness and our misery
and in it our friends and our youth
and in it our tears laughed
and in it our candles cried
and with the weakness of the friend
I love the road
I love the sea
and I Love the sky
and I love the road
because they are life
and you my love
is all the life

arabic.title: إبكى
text: ابكـــى لو فى عينى دمـــوع
و اضحكـــى لما اكـــون فرحـــان
احضنينى لو الغرام ممنوع
حسى بيا وبعنيا كونى شوق وحنان
محتاجلك تبقى جمبى تبقى قلبى
تبقى عمرى تبقى روح الروح
انا عايزك تبقى ليا تبقى فيا
اوعى ثانية من حياتنا تروح
تبقى صوتى لما اغنى
تبقى عينى لما اشوف
تبقى احساس الامان
اللى عمره ما يبقى خوف
ابكـــى لو فى عينى دمـــوع
و اضحكـــى لما اكـــون فرحـــان
احضنينى لو الغرام ممنوع
حسى بيا وبعنيا كونى شوق وحنان
محتاجلك تبقى جمبى تبقى قلبى
تبقى عمرى تبقى روح الروح
انا عايزك تبقى ليا تبقى فيا
اوعى ثانية من حياتنا تروح
ابكـــى لو فى عينى دمـــوع
و اضحكـــى لما اكـــون فرحـــان
احضنينى لو الغرام ممنوع
حسى بيا وبعنيا كونى شوق وحنان

english.title: Cry
text: Cry, if I have tears in my eyes
Laugh, when I'm happy
Hug me, if love is prohibited
Feel me and my eyes, be yearning and tenderness (x2)
I need you to be by my side, to be my heart
To be my life, to be the soul of the soul
I want you to be mine, to be in me
Don't let a second of our lives slip away
Be my voice when I sing
Be my eye when I see
Be the feeling of safety
That will never become fear
Cry, if I have tears in my eyes
Laugh, when I'm happy
Hug me, if love is prohibited
Feel me and my eyes, be yearning and tenderness (x2)
I need you to be by my side, to be my heart
To be my life, to be the soul of the soul
I want you to be mine, to be in me
Don't let a second of our lives slip away
Be my voice when I sing
Be my eye when I see
Be the feeling of safety
That will never be fear
Cry, if I have tears in my eyes
Laugh, when I'm happy
Hug me, if love is prohibited
Feel me and my eyes, be yearning and tenderness

english.title: CRY IF THERE'S TEARS IN MY EYES
text: I WILL CRY IF I HAVE TEARS IN MY EYES
I WILL SMILE WHEN IAM HAPPY
HUG ME IF LOVE PROHIBIT
FEEL ME AND MY EYES BE LOVE AND PASSOIN (X2)
I NEED YOU BISDE ME TO BE MY HEART TO BE MY WORLD TO BE MY SOUL
I WANT YOU TO BE FOR ME TO BE IN ME NEVER ONE SECODE PASS FROM OUR LIFE
BE MY PASSION WHEN I SING BE THE LOVE OFF MY EYES BE THE SAFE FEELING THAT WILL NEVER BEACOME AFRRIED
I WILL CRY IF I HAVE TEARS IN MY EYES
I WILL SMILE WHEN IAM HAPPY
HUG ME IF LOVE PROHIBIT
FEEL ME AND MY EYES BE LOVE AND PASSOIN (x3)
I NEED YOU BISDE ME TO BE MY HEART TO BE MY WORLD TO BE MY SOUL
I WANT YOU TO BE FOR ME TO BE IN ME NEVER ONE SECODE PASS FROM OUR LIFE
BE MY PASSION WHEN I SING BE THE LOVE OFF MY EYES BE THE SAFE FEELING THAT WILL NEVER BEACOME AFRRIED

arabic.title: إزاي
text: إزاي ترضيلي حبيبتي ... أتمعشق اسمك وانتي
عماله تزيدي في حيرتي ومنتيش حاسة بطيبتي , إزاي؟!
مش لاقي في عشقك دافع ... ولا صدقي في حبك شافع
إزاي أنا رافع راسك وانتي بتحني في راسي , إزاي؟!
أنا أقدم شارع فيكي ... وآمالك من الي باليكي
أنا طفل اتعلق بيكي , في نص السكة وتوهتيه
أنا لو عاشقك متخيّر ... كان قلبي زمانه اتغير
وحياتك لافضل أغير فيكي لحد ماترضي عليه
إزاي ترضيلي حبيبتي ... أتمعشق اسمك وانتي
عماله تزيدي في حيرتي ومنتيش حاسة بطيبتي , إزاي؟!
مش لاقي في عشقك دافع ... ولا صدقي في حبك شافع
إزاي أنا رافع راسك وانتي بتحني في راسي , إزاي؟!
إزاي سايباني بضعفي ... طب ليه مش واقفة في صفي
وأنا عشت حياتي بحالها عشان ما ألمحش في عينك خوف
و في بحرك ولّا في برّك ... إزاي أحميلك ضهرك
وأنا ضهري في آخر الليل دايماً بيبات محني ومكشوف
أنا أقدم شارع فيكي ... وآمالك من الي باليكي
أنا طفل اتعلق بيكي , في نص السكة وتوهتيه
أنا لو عاشقك متخيّر ... كان قلبي زمانه اتغير
وحياتك لافضل أغير فيكي لحد ماترضي عليه
إزاي ترضيلي حبيبتي ... أتمعشق اسمك وانتي
عماله تزيدي في حيرتي ومنتيش حاسة بطيبتي , إزاي؟!
مش لاقي في عشقك دافع ... ولا صدقي في حبك شافع
إزاي أنا رافع راسك وانتي بتحني في راسي , إزاي؟!

english.title: How?
text: How can you accept for me, when I deeply love your name (I deeply love you)
and you are keeping me confused, and can't feel my kindness, how?
I can't find a reason to love you, and my sincerity doesn't even count
How can I keep your head high when you keep forcing me to bow my head down?
I am the oldest of your streets, your hopes from those who have destroyed you
I am a child who got attached to you, and you led me astray halfway
Had I loved you out of choice, my feelings would have changed a long time ago
I swear by your name, to keep changing you till you accept me the way I am
How can you accept for me, when I deeply love your name (I deeply love you)
and you are keeping me confused, and can't feel my kindness, how?
I can't find a reason to love you, and my sincerity doesn't even count
How can I keep your head high when you keep forcing me to bow my head down?
How can you leave me this weak, why aren't you standing by my side?
When I have dedicated my entire life to not catch a glimpse of fear in your eyes (to protect you)
Over land and sea, how can I protect your back?
When I spend every night with a back that's bare and arched
I am the oldest of your streets, your hopes from those who have destroyed you
I am a child who got attached to you, and you led me astray halfway
Had I loved you out of choice, my feelings would have changed a long time ago
I swear by your name, to keep changing you till you accept me the way I am
How can you accept for me, when I deeply love your name (I deeply love you)
and you are keeping me confused, and can't feel my kindness, how?
I can't find a reason to love you, and my sincerity doesn't even count
How can I keep your head high when you keep forcing me to bow my head down?

keep me more confused than ever and you can not feel my kindness. how?!!!
i can't find any motive in your love .. and my truthful feelings were never enough
how come i keep raising your head up high and you keep forcing me to bow my head down ??

how can you accept this for me my love.... falling in love with you and you just

arabic.title: إقرار
text: أقر انا المذكور أعلاه
الساكن في العنوان إياه
بإن الصبر عليه صبر
طعم المر في قلبي فضل
يمرر في ولا عمره قدر
يغير حبك من جواه
أقر انا المذكور أعلاه
إنك مهما حتيجي عليه
يبعد ضلك من حواليه

arabic.title: المريلة كحلي - El Maryala Kohly
text: يابنت يام المريلة كحلى
ياشمس هله وطاله من دوله
لو قلت عنك فى الغزل قوله
ممنوع عليا ولا مسمحولى
انا احب اقول الشعر فى الحلوين
والحلو اقوله ياحلو فى عيونه

ميكافنيش فيهم سبع دواوين
ياملاك ياجنية ياست الحسن
يعجبنى توهانك فى احلامك

يعجبنى اخدك للكتب بالحضن
راح الصبايا والصبايا جم
اجمل ما فيهم مين غير بنتى

فى عنيك مني ومن حنان الام

english.title: Blue Skirt
text: You, the girl with the blue skirt
A sun glowing and showing under a dress
Would you allow me to write a song about you
Or you would deny it
I love writing songs about beautiful girls
I call them for what they are
If I started describing your nose
I would keep going on forever
You are an angel, a mermaid, a sleeping beauty
I love to see drafting away
I love your tight dress
I love how you hold your books to your chest
There goes the girls
Who is the prettiest, but my girl
What makes you that pretty, baby
That I see my mother's warmness in your eyes

english.title: Oh Baba
text: Oh Baba1 slow down slow down
Oh Baba, It's not in my hands
Since the break of dawn2 I find hope waiting for
the song of the breeze to sing
my song that resides within me.
It looms out to me and heals my pain3
Her soothing heals it
Sing, my heart and with it my soul
[It] makes dreams fly above, above4
It glances at tomorrow and awakens
with it my days will become cleared up5
Leave me to my promise that I live
I have chosen my love and I am happy with my choice
Oh Baba, slow down slow down
Oh Baba, It's not in my hands
The mercy that patience bestowed
I have found within the mantle of the sunrise
She made me forget through her freshness.
It is my right, when the world is stormy,
To melt6 in her shade, in her embrace
And name my loving heart as hers
Imagine that what comes next is delightful7
with the sun of my love which resurrects the soul8
She cheered me up openly
Leave me to my promise that I live
I have chosen my love and I am happy with my choice
Oh Baba, Slow down, slow down
Oh Baba, It is not in my hands
With the shaping of her eyebrows she charmed me
with the naughtiness9 of the pupil [of the eye]
and her eyelashes that are mesmerizing me
and the touch of her cheek is art
Her heart is the sweetest of homes
She is all the colors
There are loads of pretty people
But she is different from all that is known
[she is] the beginning of swimming and flying
Leave me to my promise that I live
I have chosen my love and I am happy with my choice
Oh Baba, Slow down, slow down
Oh Baba, It is not in my hands

وحسسيني انك حجر أو وردة دبلت عالشجر
صبرت صبر غريب رهيب لا يحتمل
بتبعديني عن حياتك بالملل
وخلتيني أقول خلاص مفيش أمل
وبتوهمينى اني ظلمتك
واني غربتك هزمتك

كل اللى ممكن اعمله معاكي اتعمل

ابعد وقبل ضياعي منك تندمي

english.title: The Sea of Life
text: The sea of life is deceitful, and where are we leaving to?
It brings secrets, and we walk by its side
The days pass by and leave and we don’t [even] feel it
The dreams live and die, oh our hearts, oh the ones who fear
A bird emigrates and returns, the Sun goes away and returns
The world takes and gives, and the night, however long, will end
A bird emigrates and returns, the Sun leaves and returns
The world takes and gives, and the night, however long, will end
During the nights, we dream; we got tired and returned to being on our own, without anyone
Try to change, and appreciate your fate

The days pass and leave, [but] tomorrow will surely come

text: Enough long-winded conversations
Enough deceit and treachery
There is no more time darling
for complaints and separation
Your past in love is full of priors1
You are not to be trusted in love
I want a love full of longing
not a love that leads to the Luman2
I never love cheaters
nor do I love liars
Do not attempt to sell water
in the alley of water sellers3
Whom are you trying to fool?
Whom are you trying to fool oh, knowledgeable one?
Whom are you, whom are you
selling love to?
If you're here to deceive [me]4, go ask about who I am first
Do not attempt to sell water
in the alley of water sellers
You have loads of love victims
who tell tales of you
They say that you write
seven songs in one night
And in one night
you give each song seven tunes
And the next day you recite it
with tears, longing and pain

english.title: Alright, Luck
text: Alright, luck
As you wish, luck
Are you happy with
Your jests, luck?
We stay up together
We play together
You cheer us up for day
And bring us down for a month
We make up for day
We fight for a month
Are you happy, luck?
As you wish, luck
You act like a lamb
While you're a ghoul 1
I am the camel
And you're the freight 2
Cross your palm with silver 3
Or just tell me
Is it because
I am patient?
Your orders, luck
As you wish, luck
You have a thousand faces
And a thousand eyes
And thousand colored grins 4
Where are you taking me
After you?
Do I have a choice
Or do I not?

arabic.title: حرية
text: جوايا قلبي شجر مقلوع
بعطش اليكي واحن واجوع
ياللي انتى حبك حرية
في العشق آه ولا شئ ممنوع
يا سمرا يا سمرا
دى شفايفك لمّا بتتنهد أنا بستشهد
وبعيش فى النار، أعيش فى النار
وعيونك لمّا بتتلفت أنا بتفتت
ما الحقش احتار، ما الحقش احتار
ضميني خديني انا لاجيء
و لاول مرة بكون صادق
موتني العشق و مش فارق
ليل ولا نهار يا سمرا يا سمرا
الجنة قصادك بتفتح
عنيكي بتسكت و تلمح و تقول اسرار
هزيني بسحرك من جوه
دانا قلبي لا حول ولا قوة ضد التيار
انا عارف اني ماليش دية
فى عنيكي ديا آخر المشوار
ضميني خديني انا لاجيء
و لاول مرة بكون صادق
موتني العشق و مش فارق

english.title: Freedom
text: There are uprooted trees inside my heart
I thirst, long and hunger for you
You, whose love is freedom
In love, nothing is forbidden
O Samra, o samra 1
When your lips sigh, I'm martyred
And I live in fire, I live in fire
When your eyes look around, I'm shattered
And I don't find the time to wonder
Embrace me, I am a refugee
And for the first time I'm honest
Love has killed me, and it doesn't matter
Whether it's day or night, O Samra, o Samra
Heaven opens before you
Your eyes are silent, they hint and reveal secrets
Sway me with your magic within
My heart is powerless against the current
I know I don't cost blood money
In your eyes, at the end of the road
Embrace me, I am a refugee
And for the first time I'm honest
Love has killed me, and it doesn't matter
Whether it's day or night, O Samra, o Samra

Hug me, I'm a refugee
And this is the first time I'm being honest
Love is killing me
I suffer on days and nights
You Al Samra You Al samra

english.title: Step Inside
text: Step inside my heart and enter my soul in peace
My wound is yours, my pulse is yours, and the talk is the same
The beginning of the street of sorrows, a wound awoken in a soul
The street of sorrows ends, when, one day, we are able to confess
Step inside my heart and enter my soul in peace
The talk is the same
Oh, when I talk and you believe, oh, the truth
Oh, when I talk and you believe, oh, the truth
From your right, from your left, from there or from here
Know me, you will find the possible truth
Hug me, embrace me, throw me in the air

english.title: The Charm of Singing
text: the charm of singing united us in its heart, a soul singing to a soul
The light of our emotions is a melody taking us away and we go with it
When we sing together we beautify a dream whose horizon is open
By your will,1
By your will, the whisper of words reaches
from your soul
to [and with] mine, the singing will go on
It2 becomes happy then laughs .. We dream that it becomes your happy omen
We are the soul of the singing, and singing is our soul
Am I playing around?
No, I'm being good company. I [love] relaxed singing
Oh, night..
Oh3 ...  we're in company and I'm in love
My heart is overflowing with longing..
wandering in the melodies
All being sang, as if it was a paradise
the charm of singing united us in its heart, a soul singing to a soul
The light of our emotions is a melody taking us away and we go with it

arabic.title: سيدي
text: سيدى سيدى سيدى
ما عنده صديق
وما عنده لحبيب
اللى لى وليك
ايمانه فى الله كبير
صبر يناله قولو امين
امله فيك هو الدليل
شوفوا جروحه يا مسكين
نهار اليوم بنا شاهد
يسمع بينا واحنا جاين
ها هو جاى يا خوتى
سيدى السلطان يا حبابى
ها هو جاى
سبحان الله يا العالم
فتحوا الابواب يا ولادى
ها هو جاى
ما عندى غيرك يا ربى
يفتح الابواب للخير
فى بلاد الناس عايش غريب
مرت الايام وانا ما نسيت
يا بنت بلادى ادير هويت
قطعت بحور انا ليك جيت

english.title: Master
text: Master, master,
He has no friend
Nor beloved
As you and I do,
His faith in God is great,
He is patient, say amen.
His hope in you is the proof,
Look at his scars, poor man.
The day is the witness,
He hears us as we arrive.
Here he comes now, brothers,
our beloved prince,
here he comes.
Glory be to God,
Open the doors, my children,
here he comes.
O God, I have no one but you,
open the doors to goodness.
In the people's country, I lived as a stranger,
the days passed but I have not forgotten.
O girl of my country, here I am,
I crossed many seas but here I came.

english.title: Winter
text: After he gave & after he took
After he destroyed, built & flamed
He grabbed the coverlet of winter avoiding coldness
After he turned around & wheeled (revolved)
After he calmed down (rested) & after he was excited (rise)
After he melted, missed & was confused (puzzled)
He putted down his ring & his watch
He putted down his cigarettes & his lighter
He putted his dreams on the coat hunger
He pulled the winter coverlet on his body
He skidded (rolled) his dream, sadness & name
He covered the eyes that want to smile
Who spent his life joking.
Who spent his life working.
Just grabbed coverlet of winter avoiding coldness.
He putted down his ring & his watch
He putted down his cigarettes & his lighter
He putted his dreams on the coat hunger

english.title: A tribute to Egypt
text: Even though we may be engrossed in our lives

You're the love of my life, the mother of Civilization, the most precious of motherlands
Who can get you to safety
To get you through tomorrow but for the brave?
In a moment in a nation's history
When its ship needs a captain
O Egypt, I am the first one to know heroism, I made it eternal
We still have another shore to cross
A lot of dreams that I love
This is our homeland, it needs no wishes
It needs hard work from its children
O Egypt, the mother of civilization, the most precious of homelands

To get you through tomorrow but for the brave?

english.title: In loving women
text: She said to me: "I want you, O cousin."
"Come taste the honey, dripping on my lips."
"Go easy on me, I can't stand a hug"
You go easy on me. I'm my parent's only son.
* music starts *
The mint plants of the garden, watered in their basins.
Banana trees have yielded, shading their branches.
In loving women, I have used up my luck.
My car's tires broke down today.
I presented my case to the governor of Khartoum.
He postponed my hearing to the Judgement Day.
I asked "What's her name?", the girls responded "Ne3mat (blessings)"
Whose fingers are like dates, two of which exceedingly ripe (Rutab).
Once she called us, waving her soft hands.
I answered "yes", two, three, four, five yeses.
Your greenness is like a garden, with a fruitful fig tree.
Your figure, as it walks, is like a curvy branch
Your bones are soft, and they fit nicely with your curves.
One curve, two, three, four, and five curves.
O you with the two golden necklaces of 33 karats.
A beauty never seen by an eye or a midwife.
Once she appeared among us, everyone fell, drunken.
Milk was spilled on her, you couldn't distinguish it from her whiteness.

english.title: Home's Heart is bleeding
text: Home's Heart is bleeding and it can't take it anymore

We protect the rose petals from our tears that flows on our cheeks

Our Home's heart is bleeding, it can't take it anymore

زيي انا؟
يا حلم نفسي تحلمه كل القلوب
يا أعلى احساس شدني
خلاني أدوب
خلاني أحس إني بشر

english.title: Lama El Naseem (When the breeze..)
text: Whenever the tender breeze passes through your hair, my love, i hear it sighing with passion.
And your calm (or smooth) perfume that is dissolved in you, whenever it touches you, it sighs with passion.
Why, when you tell me you adore me, you don't want me to scream and fill the whole universe with my passionate sighs?
Oh, you are a star, that whenever its light touches a stone, it raises it up high and turns it into a moon.
I write your name, with dewdrops, on all the tree leafs there is.
who can ever describe you the way i do?
who can ever love you as much as i do?
Oh, you are a dream, that i wish for all the hearts to experience (or to dream of).
You are the greatest feeling that ever mesmerized me, melted me down, and made me feel like i am human.
Why, when you tell me you adore me, you don't want me to scream and fill the whole universe with my passionate sighs?

english.title: Lama El Naseem
text: I hear it when the breeze passes in your hair darling
And your calm perfume which is melted in you ,whenever it touches you I can hear it
Why when you are telling me you love me ,you don’t want me to shout and fill the world with my scream !!
Oh you are a star whenever it’s shine touches a stone ,it will heighten and change to a moon
I will write the letters of your name by dewdrops on the leaves of all the trees
Who can describe you as me?
Who can love you as much as me?
Oh you are a dream ,I hope it can be seen by all the hearts
You are the highest feeling attracted me ,and made me melt ,made me feel my humanity
Why when you are telling me you love me ,you don’t want me to shout and fill the world with my scream !!

text: when the light air passes through your hair..i hear it
saying(Ahhhhs)..& your quiet fragrences,melt in you, when touching you..
saying (Ahhhhs)..the why do u want me while i'm saying "I adore you"..

you're the star whose lights turn each stone they fall on..into a moon
I write the letters of your name
by the rinse on all leaves of the trees

you're the dream that i hope all hearts could see it
you're the highest(greatest) feeling took me..made me melt..made me feel that i'm a humanbeing
then why do you want me not to fill the universe with my (Ahhhs) while saying I adore you!

arabic.title: لو باقي في عمري
text: لو باقي في عمري شوية وقت
أحب أشوفك أخر حد
واغمض عيني على شكلك
من بين ملايين عُشاق الأرض
مكتوب أسامينا إن إحنا لبعض
مكتوب على قلبي إنه يحب
ده مَحدش قدّي محتاجلك
وإنتِ من بعدي مَلكيش حد
عشق جوايا مزلزلني وقاسمني معاه نصين
عشق جوايا مغميني وموديني معاه على فين
مَكفنيش فيكي عشق الدنيا
ولا عشق الأزمان التانية
أصل أنا مَشبعتش يوم منك
جوايا روحك متشالة
ماشية في شرايني وشغالة
وأدّفى لما أسمع نَفَسِك

english.title: If there was a little time in my life
text: If there was a little time in my life
I would like to see you  the last one
I close my eyes to your face
Among the millions of lovers on  the earth
Our names are written as if we are belong to each other
My heart is destined to love
No one needs you like me
After me, you are not having anyone
Love is inside me ,shook me and divided me into two
Love is inside me ,blinded me,Where will I go ?
It is not enough for me  the love of the world
And the love of other times
I am not satisfied one day from you
Your spirit is  kept inside me
It is  in my  arteries and it works
And I  warm up when I hear  breath

arabic.title: لو بطلنا نحلم نموت
text: لو بطلنا نحلم نموت
لو عاندنا نقدر نفوت
لو عدينا مرة خلاص
لو ردينا ضاع الخلاص
حبة صبر حبة حماس
يبقى الحلم صورة وصوت
لو بطلنا نحلم نموت
حضن فى غربة ملمس مثير
بعد مشاغبة هترقلك
مرة فى مرة حاول كتير
اى مغامرة راح تنفعك
وقت الحلم وقته فى سكوت
لو بطلنا نحلم نموت
رقصة شهية هي الحياة
دى العشقية والمعشقة
مرة فى مرة حلمك هواه
يملى الدنيا بالزقزقة
ويبقى الحلم صورة وصوت
لو بطلنا نحلم نموت

english.title: If we stopped dreaming we would die
text: If we stopped dreaming we would die
If we insisted dreaming we would pass
If we crossed over once that's it
If we fleed survival will be lost
A little paitence a little ensusiasm
The dream will become living reality
A hug in foreignness exciting touch
After struggle will taste sweet to you
A time after another try alot
Any adventure will benefit you
The time of the dream has approched
If we stopped dreaming we would die
Life is a sexy dance
It's love and passion
A time after another your dream
Will fill the world with chirp
And the dream will become living reality
If we stopped dreaming we would die

arabic.title: ليالي
text: لا يا ليالى لا لا تفرقينا
ولا من قمرنا لا من سهرنا لالا ولا تسراقينا
هي رحله ورحنا فيها هي رحله وياما فيها
سكه ماشيه وعمر ماشي لسه اجمل يوم مجاشى
في الليالى البرد قربينا لبعض
ايد تطبطب ايد تداوي صوت يونس بالحكاوي
لملمينا من الدروب واسراقينا من الغروب
لسه بكره وبعده الف سؤال ورد
لسه الف طريق وسكه لسه الف والف ضحكه
خلي قمر السهره صاحي من براح النور براحي

english.title: Nights
text: No, nights, no, no..  don't separate us
No, from our moon, no, nor our time staying up, no, don't rob us
It is a journey we went on. It is a journey with so much in it
A path that is moving and life is moving onward, still the best day has not come yet
In the cold nights bring us closer to each other
A hand soothes while the other heals, a voice that entertains through [its] stories
Gather us from the paths and steal us from the sunset
Still tomorrow and after it there will be a thousand questions and answers,
Still there's a thousand roads and paths, still there's a thousand and a thousand laughs
Keep the night's moon awake, the vastness of the light is mine

arabic.title: متخليش حاجه توقفك
text: كل المفروض مرفوض
اثبت للعالم انك موجود موجود
متخليش حاجه توقفك
ماتسيبش الدنيا تكتفك
اقفل باب حزنك على الاخر
وافتح باب الفرصه وعافر
كل الحدوته شويه مجهود
ماتسيبشى الخوف
يسرق من روحك برائتها
يسجن اصرارها و جرأتها
ويهد طموحها وقوتها
ويتحكم فيك
جواك انسان
يقدر على الدنيا و موواليها
يقدر لو مالت يعدلها
يقدر يكسبها
و القوه دايما فى ايديك

english.title: Do not let anything stop you
text: Do not let anything stop you
Each imposed unacceptable....Prove to the world that you exist is
Each imposed unacceptable.... Prove to the world that you exist is
Do not let anything stop you .... Do not let life lock you up
Close the door of your sorrow fully
Open the door of opportunity and keep on working hard
The whole thing is to exert some effort
Do not let fear steal the innocence of your soul,,,, imprison its determination and courage,,,, and destroy ambition and power,,,,and control you
Your human inner strength will overcome the obsacles of life
You can make it straight if it is tended,,,
You can beat it,,,, Power is always in your hands
Do not let anything stop you .... Do not let life lock you up
Close the door of your sorrow fully
Open the door of opportunity and keep on working hard
The whole thing is to exert some effort

arabic.title: ممكن
text: اسكن بيوت الفرح آه ممكن
اسكن بيوت الحزن لا يمكن
ومستحيل يا حزن راح تسكن
قدر الزمان يفهمنا آه يمكن
شكلني بطعم الأفراح
لوني بلون التفاح
وبطعم المانجة وكمانجة
تعزفلي ع الجرح ارتاح
يمكن
مشينى على كفوف الراحة
نسيني لو حلم وراح
واشمعنى المعنى بيعرفني
لو باتت فى قلوبنا جراح
يمكن
اسكن بيوت الفرح آه ممكن
اسكن بيوت الحزن لا يمكن
ومستحيل يا حزن راح تسكن
قدر الزمان يفهمنا آه يمكن

english.title: Possible
text: Its possible, to live in places of joy
Its impossible, to live in places of sadness
Its impossible for you sadness to live
Its possible that the world would understand us
Mix me with joy
Color me apple red
Color me yellow and music
You play on my wounds to make me relax
Possible
Walk me on the peace of the mind
Make me forget, even if it was just a dream
Why I am recognized
If we still have the wounds
Possible
Its possible, to live in places of joy
Its impossible, to live in places of sadness
Its impossible for you sadness to live
Its possible that the world would understand us

arabic.title: من غير كسوف
text: من غير كسوف
قولتى انا عشقاك انا بعترف بهواك
ده انا من زمان عيزاك تبقى حبيب قلبى
من غير كسوف
سبتى الكلام يتقال معرفش ليه اتقال
كانه كان موال بتردديه جنبى
مشيت وياكى للاخر اتارى اولك اخر
عنيكى خدتنى للحلم اللى مبيكملش
كلام خلى احلامى تشوفنى واشوفها قدامى
وهمتينى وخلاص مقدرش متكلمش
من غير كسوف
ايوه انا مليت من كتر ماستنيت
وتعبت لما داريت احساسى بعنيكى
من غير كسوف
انتى اللى انا حبيت وعشقت واتمنيت
شيلتك فى قلبى سنين عمال اخبيكى

english.title: without ebaressment
text: without ebaressment
u said that u love me i confess so
from long ago i want u to be my sweet heart
without ebaressment
u left the words to be said,i dont know why it was said
it was like a song u are singing beside me**
i kept following u till the end and i discoverd that your begining is your end
your eyes took me to the incomplete dream
words let my dreams see me and i see it infront of me
u kept me in illusion and i cant dont talk
without embaressment
yes,i'm fed up from waiting
and i'm tired when i hide my feeling with your eyes
without embaressment
your are the one i love and wanted
i kept u in my heart for years trying to hide u

arabic.title: مهموم
text: على قد الحب بيبقى اللوم
وانا باقي عليكوا انما مهموم
والغربة في حضنكوا طعمها خوف
مهو انتوا عيوني انما مكتوف
ايه فايدة عين مبقتش تشوف
كل اللي هييجي في بال انسان ليكوا عملته
قلبي المحني بحمل الاشواق تقلت شيلته
كل اللي هييجي في بال انسان ليكوا عملته
قلبي المحني بحمل الاشواق تقلت شيلته
بتحبوني ولا دة كيفكوا تتحدوني
اللي ما بينا بقى بالنسبالي مهوش مفهوم
لو كان للصبر حبال هتدوب
وانا عاشق جرح من المحبوب
كام مرة مشيت وواربت الباب
وعملت لحبكوا الف حساب
انا عاشق فعلا مش كداب
كل اللي حييجي في بال انسان ليكوا عملته
قلبي المحني بحمل الاشواق تقلت شيلته
كل اللي حييجي في بال انسان ليكوا عملته
قلبي المحني بحمل الاشواق تقلت شيلته
بتحبوني ولا دة كيفكوا تتحدوني
اللي ما بينا بقى بالنسبالي مهوش مفهوم

english.title: Worried
text: As much as I love you, I am disappointed
I want be with you but I am worried
Leaving home for your companionship scare me
You are my eyes but I can't see
What good are you then
I have done everything you might think of
My heart is heavy form all this longing
I have done everything you might think of
My heart is heavy form all this longing
Do you love me or you just to like to dare me
I can't understand what's going on
My patience is worn-out
I love the wound you gave me
How many times I walked away but looked back
Waiting for your love to come back
I really am in love
I have done everything you might think of
My heart is heavy form all this longing
I have done everything you might think of
My heart is heavy form all this longing
Do you love me or you just to like to dare me
I can't understand what's going on

arabic.title: ويلي
text: أنا أنا أنا
ويلي ويلي ويلي م الأيام يا شوق
مقدرش أنام فى ليلي و يرضي مين يا شوق
أنا من بعد الأسية
مشتاق نظرة حنية
ولا مكتوب عليا أعشق و أدوب
دا عيوني بيبصولك
وبعت مراسل جولك
وإنتي مين يطولك
دا إنتي العالية لفوق
أنا أنا أنا
أنا من بعد الأسية
مشتاق نظرة حنية
ولا مكتوب عليا أعشق و أدوب
دا عيوني بيبصولك
وبعت مراسل جولك
وإنتي مين يطولك
دا إنتي العالية لفوق

english.title: Weily weily
text: Me me me
Me me me
My pain, my pain, my pain from the longing days
I can't sleep at night and who does that please oh longing
After the cruelty
I'm missing a look of affection
Or was it written for me to love and melt
My eyes are looking at you
And I sent messages to tell you
But who can reach you, you are the most high

arabic.title: يا اميرة
text: ياللي بتبتسمي و حزينة
مدي إيدك سلمي
الرحلة هتهون علينا
تسلميلي وتسلمي
عدي ع الأحزان معايا
ولاجل بكرة اتبسمي
رحلتنا مالهاش نهاية
إضحكي واتكلمي
لو اطول النجم أجيبه
واهديهولك يا أميرة
مين يا ناس يسيب حبيبه
عين في دمعة وعين في حيرة

english.title: Oh princess
text: Oh you who smiles and is sad
Give me your hand
The trip will be hard on us
May you be blessed
walk with me through the sadness
And smile for tomorrow
Our trip has no end
Laugh and talk
I'd reach for the furthest star
And give it to you my princess
Who would abandon his beloved
An eye in tear and an eye in puzzle

arabic.title: يا حمام
text: سمع بكايا الحجر
نهنه  وقال مالك
فتفت قلبى وانا
بابكى على حالك
فيه حاجه غاليه عليك
يا شاب ضايعالك
انا قلت ضاع الامل منى
ومش امن
باحلم اعدى الزمن
فى نطه مش ضامن
وياحمام بتنوح ليه؟
فكرت عليا الحبايب
يا حمام ضاع منك ايه؟
دوبتنى كده فوق ما انا دايب
ده العمر و احلا ما فيه
كان حلم و طار من يدى
وياحمام بتنوح ليه؟
فكرت عليا الحبايب
يا حمام ضاع منك ايه؟
دوبتنى كده فوق ما انا دايب
والحلم انادى عليه
لا بيسمع و لا بيهدى
عيب ان اقول على نفسى احترت
او اقول وليف روحى هجرنى
من بين عيون الناس اخترت
جوز العيون اللى قتلنى
م انا يا حمام زيك نايح
و الحزن ده له
لون و روايح
سهم الهوا دايما صايب

english.title: Oh Doves
text: My weeping was heard by a rock which whimpered and asked,” what is the matter?”
“You did break my heart and I am sobbing on how your case is.”
“There is something that is so precious to you young man, and you seem to have lost it.”
I said,” I lost my sanctuary, and I am not safe anymore.”
“I dream of passing age in just a leap, though unaware of the outcome.”
Rep1
Why are you crying, doves ? You made me remember my loved ones.
Oh doves, what have you lost? You are melting me more than what I am already melted.
My life and what was best in it, became just a dream and flew away out my hand.
Rep2
Why are you crying, doves you made me remember my loved ones
Oh doves, what have you lost? You are melting me more than what I am already melted.
And the dream I keep calling never heard my cry nor ever slowed down.
Rep3
Feeling a double shame to tell that I was confused, or my soulmate has deserted me,
Among the eyes of the people around me, I chose the pair that killed me.
Rep3
Feeling a double shame to tell that I was confused, or my soulmate has deserted me,
Among the eyes of the people around me, I chose the pair that killed me.
Rep4
Such as you doves, I am also sobbing,
And sadness has it’s colors and scents.
Rep4
I, I, such as you doves, I am also sobbing,
And sadness has it’s colors and scents.
Cupid arrow always hits its target.
Rep1
Why are you crying, doves you made me remember my loved ones
Oh doves, what have you lost? You are melting me more than what I am already melted.
My life and what was best in it, became just a dream and flew away out my hand.

Oh doves, what have you lost? You are melting me more than what I am already melted.
And the dream I keep calling never heard my cry nor ever slowed down.

Melted me more than what I am already melted

And the dream I keep calling never heard my cry nor ever slowed down.

Oh doves, what have you lost? You are melting me more than what I am already melted.
My life and what was best in it, became just a dream and flew away out my hand.

english.title: The Dove
text: the stone heared my crying..ehm ehm..and said what's the wrong?
you crushed my heart and I..Cried on you
there's something percious in you..lost from you
I said the safety lost and I'm not safe
I'm dreaming of crossing the time in a jump but I'm not sure
why are you moan doves?..you remembered me by the lovely people
what are you lost dove?..you melt me more than I am
the age and the most beautiful thing about it..it was a dream and it flew from my hands
and the dream call it..it isn't hearing or slowing down
for whom tell about my self I'm confused
or say my soulmate left me
between the eyes of people I picked
the eyes which killed me
dove I'm like you longs to her
and the sadness is colour and smells
the arrow of love always poignant

arabic.title: يا رمان
text: رمان خلاص انفرط حبِّك و لا همّنى
انت اتماديت فى الغلط ولاقولتليش لمّنى
ذنبك بقى على جنبك روح، لا تجينى لا تضمّنى
اوعى بلاش تجرى يا رمان
و لا تيجى على حجرى يا رمان
ما تدحرجش و لا تجرى و لا تصدقش يا رمان
و لا تيجى على حجرى لا تشرب قسوة الحرمان
اوعى بلاش تجرى يا رمان
و لا تيجى على حجرى يا رمان
عشقت من غير سبب عرفتنى منفعه
علمت قلبى الأدب سنتين تلاته اربعه
عدى الزمان وخلاص اهو بان
مين حب، مين ادعى
اوعى بلاش تجرى يا رمان
و لا تيجى على حجرى يا رمان

english.title: Ya Romman (Oh Pomegranates)
text: Pomegranate, your seeds fell apart and I don't care about your love no more
You went too far and didn't ask me for help
The fault is on you, don't come to me or try to embrace me
Careful, don't come running, oh pomegranate
Don't sit on my lap (come back to me), oh pomegranate
Don't stumble, don't run, oh pomegranate
And don't come back to me or else you'll taste the bitterness of deprivation
Careful, don't come running, oh pomegranate.
Don't sit on my lap, oh pomegranate.
I fell for you without a cause while were just using me
You taught my heart discipline for 2, 3, even 4 years
Time passed and it's clear now
Who loved and who was pretending
Careful, don't come running, oh pomegranate.
Don't sit on my lap, oh pomegranate.

arabic.title: يا طير يا طاير
text: يا طير يا طاير
دربك عباب الله
هات البشاير
وامشي في أرض الله
لاجلك لابيع الروح
خذني بحنانك
لا تبتعد وتروح
ومنين بدالك؟
يارايح قوم بليل
واحمل سلامي
إلى حبيب الروح
شوفته بمنامي

english.title: O, Flying Bird
text: O, flying bird
Your path is on Gods door
Bring us the good news
And walk on Gods land
For you, I would sell my soul
Take me in your tenderness
Do not walk away and go
Where can I find you a replacement?
You who are leaving, wake up at night
And send my greetings
To my love
Whom I have seen in my dreams

arabic.title: يابو الطاقية
text: يابو الطاقية انا قلبى معاك
تعتب عليا وبترجاك
ومن شباك لتانى شباك
هركض وراك هركض وراك يابو الطاقية
مال الهوى وشجينا والحب مايل علينا
لو ياحبيبى وانت حبيبى
تاخدنى معاك
ده عيونك اللى غيرونى
ياخوفى بكرة يفوتونى
والحب يمشى والعمر يمشى
وانا بمشى معاه

english.title: Hat Boy
text: You stole my heart, oh hat boy
you blame on me , I beg you,
And from a window to another I am chasing you...
oh hat boy...
passion calls us and we get fatigued,
but love continues to call.....
So if u are my true beloved,
take me with you darling..
your eyes have changed me,
I am afraid tomorrow they may abandon me,
love goes, time goes, and we just go.....

arabic.title: يونس
text: جاي من بلادي البعيده
لا زاد و لا ميه
و غربتي صاحبتي بتحوم حواليا
و انت تقوليلي بحبك
تحبي ايه فيا
و ده حب ايه ده اللي من غير اي حرية

يونس    انا يونس

انا يونس و نسيت مين يونس

english.title: Younes
text: Coming from my far country
No food and no water
And my isolation is my friend, hovering around me
And you tell me you love me.
What do you love in me?
And what love is this that's without any freedom?
Younes in the country of longing, oh you son of the crescent
Tears of the eye keep me company, and I've left my people
Oh you son of the crescent
Oh, Aziza, daughter of the sultan,
If time should change and you met me anywhere
I'd love you without you saying,
Younes! I'm Younes.
I'd say that's who's loved
And my heart would melt before I melt.
Oh you son of the crescent
I'm Younes, and I've forgotten who Younes is
And the world leaned on me.
My heart is lost. Who can find it for me?
Looks like I forgot it with someone of my family.
Can I love you without my heart?
Answer her or me.
Oh you son of the crescent
Oh, Aziza, daughter of the sultan,
If time should change and you met me anywhere
I'd love you without you saying,
Younes! I'm Younes.
I'd say that's who's loved
And my heart would melt before I melt.
Oh you son of the crescent
I'm Younes, and I've forgotten who Younes is
And the world leaned on me.
Younes in the country of longing, oh you son of the crescent
Tears of the eye keep me company, and I've left my people
Oh you son of the crescent
I'm Younes, and I've forgotten who Younes is
And the world leaned on me.

english.title: Younis (a little better translation)
text: Coming to a far away country, no food or water,
And my strangeness, my friend, is moving around me,
And you tell me "I love you", what do you love in me?
And what kind of love is this without any freedom?
Younis in the country of longing, oh Hilaly's son,
My tears are with me and I've left my family,
Oh son of Hilaly, nothings on me or in me,
Oh Aziza, daughter of the King, if the time (period) was to change,
And you met me anywhere,
I would've loved you without you saying "Younis!"
I would've said "Ah, this is the beloved",
And my heart would melt for you before I do,
Oh son of Hilaly, nothings on me or in me,
I am Younis, and I forget who Younis is, and the world is crumbling on me.
My heart is missing, who'll find it for me?
I probably left it with my family,
Is it possible to love you without my heart?
Why don't you answer me and her...

arabic.title: القاهرة
text: كإنها بنت جميلة بتنادي عليك
فيها سرّ بيخلّيها دايماً حلوة في عنيك
يا سحرها، عشقتها، بحبها
القاهرة ونيلها وطول ليلها
وأغانيها ومواويلها وحكاويها آه يا جمالها
القاهرة تجيلها تحنّلها
وتهواها ما تنساها وتتحاكى بأحوالها
هنا ناس تشيل عنك همّك وتقاسمك فيه
وفي عز فرحك تفرحلك وتجاملك فيه
ناس يوحشوك لما يسيبوك ويفكروك
بالقاهرة ونيلها وطول ليلها
وأغانيها ومواويلها وحكاويها آه يا جمالها
القاهرة تجيلها تحنّلها
وتهواها ما تنساها وتتحاكى بأحوالها
يا جمالها ساعة العصرية في مركب ع النيل
مع صحبة حلوة واغنية عالشوق والليل
للمغرمين والعاشقين والسهرانين
القاهرة ونيلها وطول ليلها
وأغانيها ومواويلها وحكاويها آه يا جمالها
القاهرة تجيلها تحنّلها
وتهواها ما تنساها وتتحاكى بأحوالها

english.title: Cairo
text: As if she1  was a beautiful girl calling on you,
there is a secret that makes her always look beautiful in your eyes.
How magical she is! I adored her. I love her.
Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals2  and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.
Here are such people who can take away your worries, or (at least) share it with you,
be with you in your happy moments and complement you.
Those people you miss when they leaveز. and they always remind you
with Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.
How beautiful she is at noon, in a felucca3  in in the Nile
with a nice group of people and a song about love and passion
for those are in love, in a deep passion and staying up all night long
Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.

arabic.title: مصر قريبة
text: M. Mounir:
في مصر الحضن اللي عاش يكسر بينا الحدود
مسير الغايب يعود وتلمس ايده الحيطان
مصر قريبة واوام يدوب جواها الغريب
ما بالك وانت القريب اخويا وصاحب مكان
Angham:
وانت ماشي في مصر شايف 1000 ضحكة بتناديك
وانت ماشي في مصر عارف انها فرحانة بيك
قولي فين الغربة وانت وسط اهلك مش بعيد
ده الفرح لو زار ديارك يلقى جوه ديارنا عيد
يلقى ساعة الشدة ايد
M. Mounir:
سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
سلمي يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
Bandr Saad:
نهار وليل مصر صاحية تبارك فينا النوم
تقابل ناس بالمحبة تزيد الشوق يدوم
فى مصر تقول 100 صباح الفل عليك حبيبى ياغالى
لسان الناس بالكلام الحلو ينقط سكر
حالى كل شى فيها طيب
فيها حاضر فيها طيب فيها يتلاقوا الأحبة
وبين قلوب الناس تطيب نهار وليل مصر صاحية تبارك فينا النوم

وانت ماشي في مصر عارف انها فرحانة بيك

سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة

بلاد الخير شايلة ضيوفها فوق الرآس
يا مرحب بيك قد القول واجدع ناس
تعالى اقعد منور هاتله واحد شاي
ولازم تشرب كلمة في نكته ده احنا بقينا عشرة خلاص

ابدأ منين من العشق من عن هواها يستغنى
وفي الجميل توصف كرمها كأنها الجنة
جامعة الحبايب والجيران مفيهاش غريب عني
اسهر يا ليل غني يا عين قسم وسلطني

ما بالك وانت القريب اخويا وصاحب مكان

آمان وسلام ما نعرف خصام طريق المحبة جميل
في مصر تشوف تاريخ حكاوي الزمان
وقعدة في درب النيل تنسيك هموم الدنيا
تصفي القلوب وتبوح صديقة وحبيبة وصادقة
واجمل كيان و روح شوف نفس الملامح والوجوه
العقل يحتار و يتوه والعين ما تقدر تفرق ابداً مابين عربي واخوه

the absent necessarily will come back & his hands'll touch the walls

while you are the relative, brother and place owner

and you're walking in Egypt, you're watching thousand smiles are calling you

arabic.title: الدنيا ريشه في هوا
text: الدنيا ريشة في هوا
طايرة بغير جناحين
و احنا انهارده سوا
وبكرة حنكون فين
في الدنيا في الدنيا
ياما ناس بتتقابل من غير ميعاد يجمع بينهم
و ناس بتتحايل على الفراق يبعد عنهم
مين ضمهم باديه
و اتفرقوا حواليه
سبب لقاهم ايه ايه؟
وكان فراقهم ليه ليه؟
الدنيا ريشة في هوا
طايرة بغير جناحين
و احنا انهارده سوا
وبكرة حنكون فين
في الدنيا في الدنيا
يالي بتسأل عن الحياة
خدها كده زي ماهي
فيها ابتسامة و فيها اه
فيها قسية وحنية
ياما الحياه فيها
اللى بيشكيها
و اللى بيرضيها
و اللي يقاسيها
الدنيا ريشة في هوا
طايرة بغير جناحين
و احنا انهارده سوا
وبكرة حنكون فين
في الدنيا في الدنيا

english.title: Life is a Feather in the Air
text: Life is a feather in the air
flying without wings
And today we are together
but tomorrow where will we be?
In life, in life
So many people meet without a previously set meeting,
and other people beg of separation to stay away from them
Who put them together with his hands?
and they scattered around him
What was the reason for their meeting? what? what?
And why did they get separated? why? why?
Life is a feather in the air
flying without wings
And today we are together
but tomorrow where will we be?
In life, in life
Oh, you who are asking about life
Just take it as it is
there are smiles and pain in it
There's cruelty and tenderness in it
Life is full of people
who complain about it
and others who make it content
and others who suffer it
Life is a feather in the air
flying without wings
And today we are together
but tomorrow where will we be?
In life, in life
